help.title: What I can do:
help.overview:
- Show your agenda and highlight meetings with transcripts
- Let you pick a meeting and summarize it
- Answer questions about a meeting transcript
- Reply in your language (auto-detected)
- You can ask in natural language (for example: "meetings from last Monday")
- Commands start with / and are not translated
help.select: /select <number> - choose a meeting from the list
help.language: /language <code> - set your language (example: en, es, ro)
help.how: /how - how I work and what data I use
help.contribute: /contribute - how to contribute and repo link
help.examples:
- check my agenda
- /agenda today design
- /select 2
- /summary
- /qa what did we decide?
- /language es
- /contribute

howItWorks: I use your calendar to list meetings, then look for meeting transcripts. If a meeting has a transcript, I can summarize it or answer questions. If no transcript exists, I will tell you.
contribute: To contribute, visit the Plain Concepts GitHub repo: {repoUrl}
languagePrompt: Please specify a language code (example: en, es, ro).
